Route 2: Cat Ipsum source

Make meme, make cute face throwup on your pillow favor packaging over toy, lick arm hair i am the best. Chase laser get video posted to internet for chasing red dot refuse to leave cardboard box and stares at human while pushing stuff off a table. I am the best brown cats with pink ears yet sleep nap hide at bottom of staircase to trip human for stare out the window and climb leg.

Ignore the squirrels, you'll never catch them anyway eat grass, throw it back up wake up wander around the house making large amounts of noise jump on top of your human's bed and fall asleep again hide from vacuum cleaner mark territory, wake up wander around the house making large amounts of noise jump on top of your human's bed and fall asleep again or scratch the box.
